document_data.mainbody:
ama Falice was a refugee guest of Nortales Hostel in the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Falice was a human woman with a light skin tone, mousy light brown hair, and dark brown eyes. She wore the humble garb of a commoner.
In the , as the Absolute crisis ravaged the Western Heartlands, the city of Baldurs Gate became flooded with refugees. Mama Falice and her family were lucky enough to secure lodgings at Nortales Hostel, which offered beds to the refugees but had very limited capacity. As the conflict continued to ravage the Chionthar Valley, Falice lamented the events that led her family into Baldurs Gate and often missed fresh air, being cooped up in a crowded hostel.
